name: Evolo.Mine
description: Evolo.Mine is a fascinating clicker about mining crystals. Collect resources, build new buildings. Increase your profit!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
